Blackknight: First we'll check the cargo bay, then we'll go and see 
who's in the gun turrets.

That is, he thought, if anyone survived in the turrets... It was 
unlikely that anyone being in the two underside turrets would be left 
alive...

Blackknight: Let's go check this out.

He walks away from the quarters.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> Blackknight: The ship is okay, Phanna. Now come on, we'll go 
check 
> > other parts of the ship to see if we can find anyone. Meggy can 
even 
> > help us!>>
> 
> Phanna grinned wide, cuddling her little plushie more so "Okey-day!" 
The ship 
> wasn't hurt too bad then...that was good. Everybody'd be fine, and 
they'd all 
> just get right back up and go on with the trip! Hopefully all the 
toys in her 
> room were alright...
